The Truth
Most "AI builders" are template generators with broken export buttons.

The truth nobody tells you

Most AI website builders generate the same 5 templates and call it "artificial intelligence." The export buttons don't work, the hosting is locked in, and the pricing escalates after month 3.

I tested 5 builders for 127 hours. Built 23 sites. Only 4 are still running. Here's what I found.

The Reviews

127 hours of hands-on testing. Real screenshots. Honest findings.

How I tested

I didn't just read feature lists. I built actual sites. Tried to export them. Launched them. Tracked them.

127 hours across 4 phases. Every failure documented. Every lock-in tactic exposed.

1

Generation: 8 hours

Generated 47 sites across 5 builders. Framer had the best quality. Durable was fastest but roughest.

2

Customization: 34 hours

Took 3 sites from each builder and tried to make them production-ready. Hit different walls every time.

3

Export testing: 18 hours

Tried to export from every builder. Most "export" buttons are intentionally broken or generate garbage code.

4

Real launch: 67 hours

Actually launched 4 sites and tracked them for 60 days. Only 2 are still running.

Full methodology here. Yes, I earn affiliate commissions. That doesn't change the scores.
